Lesson 3 - WAP

Expected Work

  1. Finish Vision & Plan
  2. Started Reading Solution Stack
  3. Have a concrete idea for your application
  4. Started reading design theory in web design
  5. Started on UI iterations
  6. Started installing tools in local stack and played around in Cloud9
  7. Started researching on technology stack relating to your domain problems

Agile

  1. What have you done since yesterday?
  2. What are you planning to do today?
  3. Any impediments/stumbling blocks?

Lecture

  1. Demonstrate some practice with the solution stack if needed
  2. Design Theory Aesthetics
  3. Design Theory User Experience
  4. 53 days left!

Practice

  1. Research on the technology stack
  2. Have your components and workflows and technology stack turned into UI iterations
  3. Work through the solution stack installing everything
  4. Revising the feature list according to core and value adding
  5. Setting up the blog - monetary incentive
  6. Working on at least 10 wireframes for the frontpage of your site (bring your own to demonstrate)

End Lecture

  1. Blog creation
